overview:
CEO with strong creative and entrepreneurial skills, achieving exceptional business results with limited resources.

AutoeBid.com is an innovative, award winning UK online business operating in the UK new car industry. It provides a unique online reverse auction service to generate new car orders.

The service benefits suppliers and consumers alike, saving both of them huge amounts of time, effort and money.

Orders taken to date are over £77 (m) covering all car manufacturers with an average saving over £3,000.

Specialties Internet/Software Development, Managing Business Projects, Introduction to Systems Analysis, Developing Leadership Skills, Negotiating Skills, Effective Communication, Telephone Sales Skills, Account Management, Sales Overview, ASP, MY SQL, PHP, HTML, Microsoft Image Composer, Lead Photomaps, Photoshop, Online Brand Development, Online Technology Development, SEO-Search Engine Optimization and New Car Sales
